headline: MSCI Launches Private Credit Factor Model to Bring Transparency to Rapidly Growing Asset Class
summary: NEW YORK, September 03, 2025--MSCI Inc. (NYSE: MSCI) launched a Private Credit Factor Model to help investors overcome the lack of transparency in the asset class and better assess the long-term risks it presents in their overall portfolios.
